metadata.title: CVE-2017-7436 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In libzypp before 20170803 it was possible to retrieve unsigned packageswithout a warning to the user which could lead to man in the middle ormalicious servers to inject malicious RPM packages into a users system.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7436` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzypp-bin - 17.6.1-1
libzypp-common - 17.6.1-1
libzypp-config - 17.6.1-1
libzypp1722 - 17.6.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libzypp package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '17.6.1-1').
